value:
Just as the sun must set, the dark
of night must, too, give way to dawn.
The people of Daein have my faith.

The people of Daein are exhausted
after such a long period of struggle.$k$pI want to return the smiles to their
faces somehow...someday...

When I observe the people of Askr, I
see how important it is for a place to
offer safety and foster collaboration.

Princess Sharena invited me to join
her for tea later. Isn't that nice? I can
hardly wait!

The future is clouded with
uncertainty... Surely, it—
Could it be?

I am Micaiah, Queen of Daein, come
bearing greetings as a sworn ally
of $Nf.

I vowed to remake Daein. I will make
it a country where everyone accepts
one another, with all allowed dignity.

Has something gone wrong? I will
see to it that it is corrected.

When I think of the people of Daein,
fighting against nature every day,
through the brambles and barrens...

Thank you for your guidance,
Goddess Ashunera.

I am Micaiah. I wish for everyone
to spend their lives in peace...
As ruler of Daein, it is my goal.

I was...quite shocked to learn Sanaki,
the 37th Empress of Begnion, is my
younger sister, to be sure.$k$pI am glad she wanted me to stay
with her, but...Nolan, Edward,
Leonardo, and Sothe...$k$pThe Dawn Brigade is my family.
And Daein is my homeland.$k$pThat's why I've taken the throne,
for the sake of everyone in Daein.$k$pClearing the land to prepare it
for agriculture is no easy task...$k$pThe path will be difficult...and painful.
But with my family and friends at my
side, we will make Daein prosper.$k$pWhen that day finally comes, I hope
you will come visit. Daein welcomes
you anytime, $Nu!
やぁっ！
これで…
きゃああっ！
負けない…
Hope is on our side!
The future is ours!
I will not fear you!
I will do what I must!
This can't...be happening...
Hehehe...
Legendary...Hero? I think you're confused. Are you positive you're not looking for Commander Ike?
Hm? Ah... I see Yune has some influence on you as well. Hee hee!
I, like many others, have fought in a bitter struggle to keep on living...
I am descended from Lehran and Altina—and Misaha, the former apostle, was my grandmother.
I'll stand by you no matter what. You needn't even raise the question.
Empress Sanaki... My dear little sister... Thank you.
As long as I'm here...I'll show you that, together, we can overcome anything.
Yes?
What's the plan?
Ready and waiting.
